name: Electric Toothbrush, Marlincare Electric Toothbrush for Adults 180 Days Battery Life Rechargeable with 5 Modes, 48000VPM Motor Smart Timer IPX8, Sonic Toothbrush with 4 Brush Heads &Travel Case, Black
short_description: A DEEPER CLEAN, A BRIGHTER SMILE: Powered by a next-gen brushless motor, Marlincare sonic electric toothbrush delivers 48,000 brush movements per minute to generate micro-bubbles that reach deep between teeth and gums, removing up to 10x more plaque for a fresher, healthier smile.

ULTRA-LONG BATTERY LIFE: Marlincare electric toothbrush provides up to 180 days of use on a single 4-hour charge (based on two 2-minute uses per day). Powered by a high performance rechargeable battery, the sonic toothbrush stays strong through 6 months of use. No charger needed on the go. Just grab and go!

ONE BUTTON, SEAMLESS CONTROL: Marlincare sonic toothbrush features a sleek, pressure-sensitive button that controls both power and modes. Fully dustproof, waterproof, and abrasion-resistant, it lasts up to 5x longer than rubber buttons, combining durability with modern design.

EFFORTLESS POWER/MODE SWITCH: Easily switch between brushing modes five modes (Clean, White, Sensitive, Gum Care and Polish) with a quick press, and power off any time with a 1-second hold. There's no need to cycle through all modes before turning off.

Please Kindly Note: In the latest batch of Marlincare Electric Toothbrush, brushing modes can only be switched within 3 seconds after powering on. After 3 seconds, pressing the button only turns the toothbrush off. Orders are fulfilled with either version at random.

IPX8 WATERPROOF & QUIET BRUSHING: Safe for shower use and easy to rinse, this battery toothbrush is fully IPX8 waterproof. With noise under 55 dB, it delivers a quiet, stress-free brushing experience every time.
SMART TIMER & REMINDERS: With a built-in 2-minute timer and 30-second prompts, this cordless smart toothbrush helps you brush each quadrant evenly and effectively, just like dentists recommend.
WHAT'S INCLUDED: 1 Marlincare electric toothbrush handle, 4 brush heads, 1 USB-C charging cable, and a user manual.

CARE REMINDER: To keep your electric toothbrush at its best, use it in environments between 32℉ and 104℉ (0℃-40℃). Avoid rinsing with hot water or attempting to sanitize the toothbrush with high heat. Following these tips will help maintain your sonic toothbrush in top condition.

short_description: 1. 【5 Customized Cleaning Modes for Comprehensive Care】 This adult electric toothbrush offers 5 distinct modes (Clean, White, Polish, Soft, Gum Care) to cater to all your oral health needs. Whether you desire deep cleaning, surface stain removal, or gentle gum massage, find your perfect brushing experience.

2. 【Powerful 66000 RPM Sonic Technology & Smart Timer】 Equipped with high-frequency sonic vibrations up to 66000 times per minute, it effectively removes up to 10x more plaque than a manual brush. The built-in 2-minute smart timer ensures dentist-recommended brushing time, with a gentle 30-second pacer to guide you through each quadrant of your mouth.

ergonomic w3. 【USB Fast Charging & Exceptional Battery Life】 Features convenient USB charging, allowing you to power up anywhere with a power bank, computer, or wall adapter. A single charge provides up to 30 days of uninterrupted use (varies by mode), making it the perfect travel companion without the hassle of cords or replacing batteries.aterproof black satin handle.

4. 【IPX7 Full Waterproof & Complete Package】 Enjoy complete freedom and safety with IPX7 rated full waterproof protection. The entire body can be rinsed under tap water for easy cleaning. This great value set includes 1 toothbrush handle, 1 pre-installed brush head, 2 additional replacement heads, and 1 USB charging cable.

5. 【Premium Soft DuPont Bristles & Protection】 The brush heads feature ultra-soft and durable DuPont bristles that are gentle on gums and enamel while providing superior cleaning. The toothbrush also includes short-circuit automatic protection, ensuring safety and durability for long-term use.
product_description: Product Specifications Details:· Operation Modes: 5 modes (Clean, Whitening, Polish, Gentle, Gum Care)· Cleaning Technology: High-frequency sonic vibration· Vibration Frequency: Up to 66,000 RPM· Smart Timer: Automatically shuts off after 2 minutes, with 30-second quadrant reminders· Charging Method: USB charging (cable included)· Battery Life: Approximately 30 days on a full charge (varies by mode)· Waterproof Rating: IPX7 (fully waterproof, safe to use in the shower)· Safety Features: Automatic short-circuit protection· Brush Head: High-quality DuPont soft bristles, small head for precise cleaning· Package Includes: 1 x Electric Toothbrush Handle, 1 x Brush Head (pre-installed), 2 x Extra Replacement Brush Heads, 1 x USB Charging CableIdeal For:· Adults and teenagers seeking thorough cleaning.· People with sensitive teeth and gums (gentle gum care mode).· Anyone looking to switch from a manual toothbrush or upgrade an older electric model.· Frequent travelers, thanks to long battery life and USB charging capability.Usage Instructions:· For optimal hygiene, it is recommended to replace the brush head every 3 months.· Fully charge the toothbrush before first use.· After use, rinse the brush head and handle thoroughly.· Use the included USB cable with a standard 5V/1A or 5V/2A charger for best results.

product_description:
Achieve 700% better plaque removal than with a manual toothbrush thanks to the Philips Sonicare 4100 Series sonic toothbrush paired with the C2 Optimal Plaque electric toothbrush head. Enjoy a powerful yet gentle clean, even in those hard-to-reach areas.
 
 The Advanced Sonic Technology provides gentle yet effective cleaning, pulsing fluid between teeth and along the gumline. With the built-in pressure sensor, you know when to adjust the pressure. Ease off and your gums will stay protected!
 
 To help you get used to the Sonicare experience, the EasyStart feature adjusts the power level of the toothbrush over the first 14 uses. Improve your brushing technique with QuadPacer and reach your recommended brushing time of 2 minutes with SmarTimer.
 
 Experience up to 14 days of regular brushing after a single charge, bringing a new level of convenience to your brushing routine (based on two periods of two-minute brushings per day on standard mode).
 
 Did you know that brush heads become less effective after three months? The replacement reminder tracks how often and how hard you brush, then reminds you to replace your brush head once it's time for a new one.
 
 ¹ vs. a manual toothbrush
 ² based on a study of over 2,600 dental professionals (dentists and hygienists) conducted in the United States, Canada, Japan, China, Korea, Thailand, Germany, the United Kingdom, Switzerland, France, Belgium, Austria, Italy, Spain, Sweden in 2022-2023

product_description: The Philips Sonicare ProtectiveClean 5300 electric sonic toothbrush offers a significant improvement in your dental hygiene routine, promoting wellness by enhancing your gum health up to 100% vs. a manual toothbrush. With a pressure sensor, 3 brushing modes and 3 intensity settings, this electric toothbrush is tailored to protect sensitive gums and optimize your brushing experience. Clean mode is standard for superior cleaning, White is the ideal mode for removing surface stains, and Gum Care mode adds an extra minute of reduced-power brushing, so you can gently massage your gums. The G2 Optimal Gum Care brush head provides effective clean while being gentle on gums. Click on the DiamondClean brush head to remove surface stains and reveal a whiter smile. The 2-minute Smartimer and QuadPacer help you achieve a dental professional-recommended brushing time, promoting optimal oral health. The Philips ProtectiveClean 5300 is a reliable companion, at home or on the go − it works perfectly as a travel toothbrush as well. The set includes a travel case and a charger to maintain its long-lasting lithium-ion battery that operates for up to two weeks on a single charge. The BrushSync technology tracks how long you've been using your brush head for, and how hard you've been brushing.The BrushSync replacement reminder on your handle and a short beep gives you a heads up when it's time to replace the brush head. With its sleek black design and ergonomic handle, the Philips ProtectiveClean 5300 not only prioritizes your oral health but also delivers comfort and durability, making it a smart addition to your wellness routine. Make the switch to a Philips Sonicare toothbrush and feel the difference.
